CustomField.description:
This field contains the current factoring company details for Majenta Solutions Limited Invoices in GBP. The contents of this field is copied in to the Notes__c field by workflow for compliance.
---
"***PAYMENT TERMS - 30 DAYS FROM DATE OF INVOICE***" +BR()+BR()+
"CIF Re: Majenta Solutions Ltd"+BR()+BR()+
"Code: 30-95-89"+BR()+ "Account: 48364568"+BR()
